TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
Following are the system and software configurations required for developing application with Spread.Views:

  • The widget requires one of the following browsers:
    • Microsoft IE9/ IE10/ IE11
    • Microsoft Edge
    • Mozilla FireFox
    • Safari
    • Google Chrome
  • The product required that the browser support HTML5.
  • The Import and Export services requires IIS 7.0 or higher with ASP.NET. ASP.NET 4.0 is required with Microsoft Windows 7 and ASP.NET 4.5 is required with Microsoft Windows 8.
  • The 4.0 .NET framework is also required.
